name: Neapolitan Style Pizza
recipe: Features tomatoes, mozzarella from Campania, basil, and extra virgin olive oil.

name: Chicago Style Pizza
recipe: Chicago pizza are mozzarella, ground beef, sausage, pepperoni, onion, mushrooms, and green peppers, placed underneath the tomato sauce.

name: New York Style Pizza
recipe: New York pizza with condiments like oregano, red pepper flakes, Parmesan cheese, and garlic powder.

name: Sicilian Style Pizza
recipe: Sicilian pizzas are often topped with bits of tomato, onion, anchovies, and herbs.

name: Greek Style Pizza
recipe: feature a variety of non-Greek or Greek toppings, such as feta cheese, black olives, and red onion.

name: California Style Pizza
recipe: include anything from chicken and artichokes to goat cheese and egg.

name: Detroit Style Pizza
recipe: Detroit pizza traditionally features pepperoni, brick cheese (usually Wisconsin brick cheese), and tomato sauce.

name: St. Louis Style Pizza
recipe: St. Louis pizza features Provel cheese and a sweeter tomato sauce with a hefty dosage of oregano.

name: Cheeseburger Melts
recipe: A Crunchy folded dough Loaded with a Chicken Burger Patty, Carameli.

recipe: A Crunchy folded dough Loaded with Spicy Chicken, Kotchchi Meat

recipe: A Crunchy folded dough Loaded with Black Chicken, Onion, and Cheese

recipe: A Crunchy folded dough Loaded with Spicy Veg topping, Paneer

recipe: A Crunchy folded dough Loaded with Creamy Cuttlefish & Prawn.

recipe: A soft dough rolled with sweet cinnamon butter, baked to cream

recipe: Soft, moist chocolate cake with a burst of thick, hot liquid

recipe: A soft dough rolled with delicious chocolate chips, baked to perfec.
